reviewText: I liked it much to my surprise. Can't wait to watch it again.
the dvd was not what I was expecting but it arrived in good condition ,thank you
We enjoy horse movies and collect them.  This is a very well done movie that is great for young and old

This was a horrible production. horrible acting. horrible plot creation, not put to gether well at all and not about the horse. I threw the DVD away and pulled the cover out of the case to use the case for something else. 1 star is much too high a rating for this movie.

The storyline involving a horse seemed interesting so we bought this movie. It was terribly disappointing with bad lines, unlikely buffoon-ish characters, and horrible lighting. I wouldn't even recommend it for young viewers.
I enjoyed watching this with my grandchildren ages 7-11. Great landscape and good story, didn't frighten anybody or make kids worry, but still had some action along with emotion.
